headline: Analysis-'Every electron counts': Why renewables stocks are back in play
summary: MILAN (Reuters) -A return of fund inflows into renewable energy stocks is helping to breath new life into these companies' shares, powering their strongest quarterly rise since the sustainability boom early this decade.  U.S. President Donald Trump's "One Big Beautiful Bill" and the subsequent move to direct the U.S. Treasury to restrict tax credit rules have hit the renewables industry.  With the outlook improving, Bishop said outflows from BlackRock's active clean-energy strategies had slowed.

headline: First Solar, Inc. to Announce Third Quarter 2025 Financial Results on October 30, 2025
summary: TEMPE, Ariz., October 09, 2025--First Solar, Inc. (NASDAQ: FSLR) (the "Company") will report financial results for the third quarter ended September 30, 2025, after the market closes on Thursday, October 30, 2025.

headline: Buy First Solar Stock Now for AI Energy Growth and Value
summary: The largest U.S. solar manufacturer is an AI energy stock investors should consider buying in October for great value, breakout potential, and long-term upside.
